column2: failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts."

column1: "quoteText": "The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today."
"quoteText": "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."
"quoteText": "It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop."
"quoteText": "The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
"quoteText": "Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going."
"quoteText": "You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take."
"quoteText": "The best way to predict the future is to invent it."
"quoteText": "Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking."
"quoteText": "Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does."
"quoteText": "It always seems impossible until it’s done."
"quoteText": "Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you."
"quoteText": "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us."
"quoteText": "Believe you can and you’re halfway there."
"quoteText": "Change your thoughts and you change your world."
"quoteText": "The purpose of our lives is to be happy."

column2: don’t waste it living someone else’s life."

column1: "quoteText": "Success is not how high you have climbed
column2: but how you make a positive difference to the world."
everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you."

column1: "quoteText": "The secret of getting ahead is getting started."
"quoteText": "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions."
"quoteText": "Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other."
"quoteText": "Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined."
"quoteText": "Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it."
"quoteText": "The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible."
"quoteText": "It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up."
"quoteText": "A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new."
"quoteText": "You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream."
"quoteText": "Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can."
"quoteText": "Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations
"quoteText": "Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it."
"quoteText": "If you want to lift yourself up
"quoteText": "Be the change that you wish to see in the world."
"quoteText": "Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart."
